Detailed Description

A class to manage hit reconstruction in AMS Tracker.

AMSTrRecHit is a core of the hit reconstruction. New ladder geometry (TkDBc) and calibration databases (TrCalDB) are used instead of the original TKDBc, TrIdSoft, and TrIdGeom.

Date:
2007/12/03 SH First import (just a copy of trrec.C in Gbatch)

2007/12/28 SH First refinement (for TkTrack)

2008/01/14 SH First stable vertion after a refinement

2008/01/21 SH Imported to tkdev (test version)

2008/02/13 SH Comments are updated

2008/02/19 AO New data format

2008/02/22 AO Temporary clusters reference

2008/02/26 AO Local and global coordinate (TkCoo.h) 2008/03/06 AO Changing some data members and methods 2008/04/12 AO From XEta to XCofG(3) (better for inclination)
